pullRequest.title: Added Junit Tests for classes in service/api module and Entity, Event, Locator package

Added Junit tests for KapuaIllegalArgumentException class
Added Junit tests for KapuaRuntimeException class
Added Junit Tests for Entity package
Added Junit Tests for Event package
Added Junit Tests for Locator package
Signed-off-by: Sonja sonja.matic@comtrade.com

nodes.bodyText: Please use enhanced for loop: "                for (KapuaErrorCodes ker: kapuaErrorCodes) {"
Please use enhanced for loop: for(Throwable thr:throwables)
